dynamic_elements.map_title: Country of origin of composers in MusicBo
dynamic_elements.map_points_query:
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX p: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/>
PREFIX ps: <https://w3id.org/payswarm#>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/> 
PREFIX psv: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/statement/value/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>
PREFIX bd: <http://www.bigdata.com/rdf#>

SELECT DISTINCT ?point ?lat ?long
WHERE {
  ?s a <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/amr/Person>;
    owl:sameAs ?point .
  FILTER (regex(str(?point), "http://www.wikidata.org/entity/", "i"))
SERVICE <https://query.wikidata.org/bigdata/namespace/wdq/sparql> {
?point wdt:P106 wd:Q36834  .
?point wdt:P27 ?country .
?country p:P625 ?statement .  
?statement psv:P625 ?node. ?node wikibase:geoLatitude ?lat ; wikibase:geoLongitude ?long.
SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".} 
}
}
LIMIT 690
